summary.p: Felix Pfest was delegated to the city assembly [on July 8] in Frankfurt. Emperor [Charles V] is reportedly on his way to Southern Germany due to the war in the Netherlands; according to reliable information, the Turk [Sultan Suleiman I] personally arrived in Belgrade with an army of 300,000 men on the same day the Emperor arrived in Genoa [May 25, 1543] and is advancing towards Vienna; he is now likely in Buda or even further upstream [on the Danube].

div.p: Felix Pfest has been delegated to the city assembly in Frankfurt. The Emperor is reportedly coming to Kempten, Memmingen, Ulm, and Speyer in Southern Germany, as the war in the Netherlands is intensifying. It is certain news that the Turk, with an army of 300,000 strong, personally arrived in Belgrade on the same day the Emperor arrived in Genoa, and is advancing towards Vienna; I suspect he is now in Buda or even further upstream.
